adapter.classes
Class MoleFinderArrayAdapter

java.lang.Object
  
      adapter.classes.MoleFinderArrayAdapter

public class MoleFinderArrayAdapter
extends

This adapter is used to put the images and text fields into the layout used to view images.

Author:
mbessett

                              int layoutId,
                              int imageId,
                              int titleTextId,
                              int commentTextId,
                              java.util.List<DatabaseEntry> items)
Explicit constructor, allows caller to set all internal variables.

Parameters:
context - The calling Activity
layoutId - The XML layout file ID
imageId - The ImageView to display the thumb nail
titleTextId - The TextView to display the title
commentTextId - The TextView to display the comments
items - The list of DatabaseEntry objects to display

Method Detail

getView

public View getView(int pos,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
getView is used to join the images with the image views and to set the text of the text views

Parameters:
